code: import React from'react';import sun from'../images/sun.png';import moon from'../images/moon-3.jpg';import{useContext}from'react';import{ThemeContext}from'../Context';import'../components/banner.css';import{jsx as _jsx}from"react/jsx-runtime";import{jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";var Toggle=function Toggle(){var theme=useContext(ThemeContext);var handleClick=function handleClick(){theme.dispatch({type:'toggle'});};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"toggle",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("img",{src:sun,alt:"sun-img",className:"sun-img"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("img",{src:moon,alt:"moon-img",className:"moon-img"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"t-button",onClick:handleClick,style:{left:theme.state.darkmode?0:"30px"}})]});};export default Toggle;
